metas.name: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
metas.description: A quirky animated adventure about a family saving the world from robots, similar to the humor and adventure found in Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A heartwarming and funny family film about a bear finding his place in London. It shares the same wholesome and comedic tone as Curious George and Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: An exciting animated adventure with great characters and a heartwarming story about friendship, similar to Tangled and Puss in Boots: The Last Wish.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A vibrant and adventurous animated musical with a strong female lead, akin to Tangled and Coco in its cultural richness and memorable songs.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A funny and clever stop-motion animated film about chickens escaping a farm, in the spirit of Wallace & Gromit, perfect for kids who enjoy lighthearted adventure.
